title: Loading Screen Error
body:
Hey Guys! 
I just recently got to silver (about a week ago *dances*), but i don't have the silver band around my summoner during the loading screen... Pls help?

replies.body:
It was given out as an end of season reward. Unfortunately, you will need to be at silver at the end of next season in order to get the silver border.
The borders reflect a person's placement at the end of the previous season.
you probably reached silver just after the season ended so you didn't get the silver banner. :/
